mapper.select: SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ( DATE_FORMAT(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00'), @@session.time_zone, '+09:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AS x, Temperature AS y from ( SELECT RCVTime, Temperature FROM powerplant1_env WHERE date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND senser_id = #{sensorId} )a where mod(substr(date_format(RCVTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), 11, 2), 5) = 0 order by RCVTime asc

SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ( DATE_FORMAT(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00'), @@session.time_zone, '+09:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AS x, WindSpeed AS y from ( SELECT RCVTime, WindSpeed FROM powerplant1_env WHERE date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND senser_id = #{sensorId} )a where mod(substr(date_format(RCVTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), 11, 2), 5) = 0 order by RCVTime asc
